Description.Chinese:
A Map Layout for OldWorld. Select Map Type 'Kontinental Schneeflocke' to play this map.
World and island sizes are fixed.

Note:
- You can combine map mods as long as they do not replace the same map type.

This mod has been created with the Community Map Editor for Anno 1800.
You can download the editor at:
https://github.com/anno-mods/AnnoMapEditor/releases/latest
